item.title: Crypto Bull Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest Offloads Coinbase (COIN) Shares Worth Millions
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Crypto bull Cathie Wood’s investment management firm Ark Invest sold Coinbase (COIN) shares as the stock price climbed year-to-date (YTD) high on Tuesday. Despite the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) lawsuit against Coinbase, shares of the crypto exchange kept rallying as spot Bitcoin ETF named Coinbase as their surveillance-sharing partner. Also Read: XRP Lawyer,

The post Crypto Bull Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest Offloads Coinbase (COIN) Shares Worth Millions appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Upholds $30k Support With BTC Accumulation On The Rise: Bull Cycle Confirmation?
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Bitcoin price continues to hover above $30,000 as consolidation heats up across the crypto market. On the other hand, investors are anxiously waiting for the release of the US Consumer Price Index (CPI) – the respected inflation indicator. item.title: Singapore’s Investment Giant Temasek Drops Crypto Efforts Amid Regulatory Uncertainty
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Temasek, the sovereign wealth fund of Singapore has announced that they have no plans of investing in crypto exchanges as of now, amid the regulatory uncertainty in the market, said Chief Investment Officer Rohit Sipahimalani. During his interview with CNBC on Tuesday, July 11, Sipahimalani said: “There’s a lot of regulatory uncertainty in this environment.

The post Singapore’s Investment Giant Temasek Drops Crypto Efforts Amid Regulatory Uncertainty appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: FTX Launches Claim Portal for Creditors
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
As promised, the bankrupt digital currency trading platform, FTX Derivatives Exchange has launched a ‘Claim’ portal that will enable all of its creditors to officially file claims as one of the first steps towards recovering their locked funds from the trading platform.
